title: The Devil Bat (Horror, 1940) Bela Lugosi, Suzanne Kaaren, Dave O'Brien | Full Movie

sources.title: The Devil Bat (Horror, 1940) Bela Lugosi, Suzanne Kaaren, Dave O'Brien | Full Movie
sources.description:
His brood of blood-thirsty bats to kill on command. In the twisted tale of betrayal and vengeance, the mad scientist, Dr. Paul Carruthers engineers an aftershave lotion that causes his trained gigantic bats to kill anyone who wears it. 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/dNwSJSqwewI 


Original title: The Devil Bat (1940) 
Alternative titles: Killer Bats, La notte dei pipistrelli, Notti di terrore, Ördögi denevér, El murciélago diabólico, La Chauve-souris du diable, El ratpenat diabòlic, 蝠魔

This film is available with English & Spanish audio, and subtitles in many language options. 


Director: Jean Yarbrough 
Writers: John T. Neville, George Bricker 
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Suzanne Kaaren, Dave O'Brien 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Horror, Sci-Fi


@CultCinemaClassics

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
